events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and it looks promising based on their resume and experience.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering since they have backend development and devops skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to follow up with the software engineer applicant and coordinate next steps smoothly.
Conducted a positive initial screening call focusing on the candidate's experience with cloud infrastructure and software development.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the candidateâ€™s technical interview for next week to evaluate their programming and system design skills.
